altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.en: You’re So Cute What Should I Do

description.en:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

title.en: Isekai ni Otosareta… Jouka wa Kihon!

altTitles.en: Summoned to Another World... Purification Is Basic!

altTitles.ja: 異世界に落とされた…浄化は基本！@COMIC

description.en:
One day, a dull young man from Japan gets caught up in a heroic summoning and goes to another world. The next time he wakes up, he's not in a castle with a king, but in a deep forest since the summoning failed! You'd think he'd be at a loss, but he starts living a life of survival with a positive attitude that doesn't involve deep thought!   
Then, before he knows it, he saves the cursed forest and magical beasts one after another with his magical powers, and is befriended by wolves and dogs in a healing paradise! However, he doesn't realize that they are actually legendary demonic beasts and spirits at all. What's more, that they are adored! A positive young man unknowingly plays with the legendary magical beasts, a heartwarming and misunderstood fantasy begins!  
  


---

[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0223eu/) (Japanese)

altTitles.ja: 惚れ薬が効かない助手

altTitles.en: Assistant Who is Immune to Love Potion
An Assistant Immune to Love Potions

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: 人類蝕

altTitles.th: สาปกลืนมนุษย์

description.en: “You just die one day and turn into a mummy!” Mysterious mummified corpses that people have nicknamed “Mummily-sans” keep being found one after another, causing a lot of fuss. One day, a boy named Seita notices that his friend is acting strangely…?! Don’t miss this thrilling suspense story about an invasion by the unknown!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง อยู่เฉยๆ เขาก็กลายเป็นมัมมี่และจบชีวิตลง--” ปริศนาของศพมัมมี่ปรากฏออกมา ทีละร่างๆ ศพเหล่านี้ถูกเรียกว่า“มัมมี่ซัง“และทำให้เกิดความปั่นป่วน ในวันหนึ่ง เด็กหนุ่มชื่อเซตะ สังเกตเห็นพฤติกรรมแปลกๆ ของเพื่อนร่วมชั้น...!? เรื่องราวระทึกขวัญที่ถาโถมเข้ามาโดยที่ไม่เคยรู้มาก่อน!

altTitles.ja: イミテーション・プレイ 2 -dawn-

description.en:
Haruma and Nagisa have overcome their strained relationship due to their "sex friends contract" and have confirmed their feelings for each other. Now that Haruma is his boyfriend, he grows sweeter with each passing day, and Nagisa is constantly at his mercy with his straightforward expressions of affection...! They
are so happy that it's almost scary, and they are enjoying a fulfilling life together as lovers, both physically and mentally. However, at work they are just senior and junior, and their relationship is still a secret.
Even when female customers who are after Haruma ask if he has a girlfriend, he can't bring himself to say that it's "me"... Then, a certain person who is looking for Nagisa appears--!?

What lies beyond the unrequited love that was thought to be impossible to fulfill.
[A younger bartender who is at the mercy of Nagisa x A strong-willed and devoted beautiful bar owner] The long-awaited lovers edition restarts!

altTitles.ja: あくまでクジャクの話です。

altTitles.en: It's just a story about peacocks.

description.en:
Kuji Yakurou is a teacher who was cheated on and dumped by his girlfriend because of his "lack of masculinity". Shouldn't the world be gender-free? He is in anguish, and then Akano, a model, influencer, high achiever, and head of the biology department, appears before him and asks him to be the advisor of the biology department. She then begins to explain why "masculinity" is necessary to be popular after all, using the flamboyant feathers of a peacock as an example of "biology"...! 

This is a biological comedy that confronts you with the brutal truth!
description.es-la:
Kuji Yakurou es un profesor que fue engañado y abandonado por su novia debido a su "falta de masculinidad". ¿No debería el mundo estar libre de género? Está angustiado, y luego Akano, una modelo, influencer, triunfadora y jefa del departamento de biología, aparece ante él y le pide que sea el asesor del departamento de biología. Luego comienza a explicar por qué la "masculinidad" es necesaria para ser popular después de todo, ¡usando las extravagantes plumas de un pavo real como ejemplo de "biología"...!

¡Esta es una comedia biológica que te enfrenta a la brutal verdad!

altTitles.ja: イミテーション・プレイ

description.en:
Nagisa, who is the bar owner, has unrequited feelings for his junior at work, Yuuma. To him, I’m nothing more than an “admired senior”. Nagisa hides his feelings by sleeping around with strangers. However, while he was meeting up with his partner, he was caught by Yuuma. If he is going to end his one-sided feeling, he wanted to make Yuuma feel disillusioned.

“I’ll be your sex partner from now on”

They come to an agreement with each other and Nagisa is stuck in a predicament that leaves him tattered and torn deep down…

A charming younger bartender and a strong, beautiful shopkeeper who is clumsy in love.

A mild, sweet and emotional love story that will keep you twisting and turning the love that you’ve been keeping deep down in your heart.
This museum's treasured collection is a slew of strange comics!
description.zh: 这个博物馆，珍藏着许多奇怪的漫画！

altTitles.ja: アエカナル

description.en: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

description.en:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

altTitles.ja: 冬月

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

description.en: During the era of space exploration, mankind is at war against monsters of unknown origin. The battle is grim, and the future looks bleak. Amidst the chaos, mankind plays their last hand. It's time for the Knights to step into the fray and turn the tide of this war.

title.en: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.ja: 元奴隷ですが、鬼の奴隷を買ってみたら精力が強すぎるので捨てたい……

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei o Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.en: I'm a Former Slave, but I Tried to Buy an Oni Slave Whom I Later Found to Have Too Much Energy, so I Want to Throw Him Away...
I Bought a Demon Slave but He's So Strong That I Want to Throw Him Away...

altTitles.zh: 本来身为奴隶，买了鬼做奴隶结果却因为精力太旺盛了好想扔掉

description.en: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her “slave” status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)
description.ja:
「誰でもいいから、彼女になってくれんかねー」
「本当に誰でもいい？　私でも？」

男女交際に興味があるのに、彼氏はいたことがない高校２年生の早川夏帆。ある日、同級生の三浦拓海が彼女を欲しがっていることを知って、勢い余ってその場で交際を申し込んでしまった！履歴書で自己紹介、「恋人とやりたいことリスト」の共有、初めてのふれあい――。二人の不思議な関係は「お試し交際」を通じて段々深まっていって……!?
description.pt-br:
"Eu quero tanto uma namorada que me contentaria com qualquer uma a esta altura." 
"Sério? Qualquer uma? Até mesmo eu?" 

Kaho, que nunca teve um namorado antes, queria entrar em um relacionamento entre um homem e mulher.
Takumi, que queria uma namorada, por acaso estava falando sobre isso na frente dela. Uma história de amor emocionante sobre amadurecimento!

title.en: Kimi ga Shinu Made Koi wo Shitai

altTitles.ja: きみが死ぬまで恋をしたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Love You Till Your Dying Day
My Wish Is To Fall In Love Until You Die

altTitles.ja: きみ死ぬ

altTitles.pl: Pragnę Cię kochać aż do Twej śmierci

altTitles.uk: Хочу кохати, допоки ти не вмерла

altTitles.id: Keinginanku Adalah Jatuh Cinta Sampai Kamu Mati

altTitles.th: เพียงได้รักตราบสิ้นลมหายใจ

altTitles.en: I want to love you until you die

description.en:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.
description.uk:
Десь на далекому закуточку світу між високих гір є одна дитяча школа-інтернат. Тут дітей ще з малого віку виховують, як магічно-військову зброю та гонять на війну заради країни. Будь-кого можуть відправили на поле бою в будь-який момент, а шанси вижити навіть у старанного учня – мізерні. Жорстока буденність, у якій немає місця для співчуття до загиблих товаришів.

Шіна – звичайна чотирнадцятирічна учениця цієї школи, серцю якої важко миритися з такою буденністю. Однієї ночі, вона зустріла в холі скривавлену дівчинку, яка щойно повернулася з бою – Мімі. Здавалося б, вони несумісні: Шіна не зносить тягаря оточуючої реальності та прагне мирного життя, а Мімі йде на війну з радісною посмішкою та повертається в крові подоланих ворогів. Проте разом проведений час та щире бажання зрозуміти один одного змогли навіки переплести їх долі, які тепер розлучить лиш смерть.

Це історія двох дівчат між смертю та коханням, які знайшли в цьому світі свою маленьку невинну мрію.

description.en: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
description.pl: Kiedy bezwzględny lord Tiwakan przejmuje królestwo Nauk, księżniczka Liene Arsac staje przed niemożliwym wyborem: poślubić swojego porywacza lub patrzeć, jak jej ojczyzna się rozpada. Ale lord Tiwakan pragnie nie tylko władzy; pożąda Liene, a jego oddanie wzbudza w niej mieszankę strachu i niezaprzeczalnego przyciągania. Ponieważ jej były narzeczony, Lafitte, wciąż jest uznawany za zaginionego, Liene musi zdecydować, czy zaufać obietnicom Tiwakana, czy też mieć nadzieję na ratunek. Gdy niebezpieczne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, decyzja Liene może zmienić los Nauk - i jej własnego serca - na zawsze.

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方
石神戦記

description.en: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...?
description.ja: 四方を海に囲まれた島国・日倭津国。先王の死後、この国は"王太子派"と"王弟派"の二つに割れようとしていた。その情勢下、北東にある瑞穂領は婚姻により"王弟派"につくことを選ぶ。領主の弟・宇迦乃イサザは、兄の婚礼の日に生じた混乱の中で、石を操る不思議な力を持つ「石の民」の女と出会い、婚姻を迫られることに……！？

altTitles.ja: 王子様のおたわむれ

description.en: In a world where a gate leading to another world has appeared on Earth, Aoi is an office worker working as an entry control bureau employee. One day, while dealing with ordinary people who have mistakenly entered another world, she meets Erhardt, a prince of the demon tribe who has come from another world. For some reason, he becomes enamored with Aoi and she becomes his caretaker during his stay on Earth. Even though Aoi dreamt of an ordinary marriage with modest happiness.

altTitles.ja: メイキャッパー

description.en: (from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei, a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone, arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!

altTitles.ja: トキワ来たれり!!

description.en: Tokiwa Yasaka lives in an unusual time, and according to his dreams, it's about to become even stranger. He's been having a dream of a woman called Rein ever since the robot Deus Ex Machina III came to his home. He and Machina attend the same school, where their other classmates include a secret ninja (Kanata Kusanagi) and a sorcerer (Haruka Yata). When Tokiwa, the robot, the ninja, and the sorcerer rush to rescue the student council president from a demon, the boys find that they've all been having the same dream! What is going to happen to their world?
description.ja: 八坂トキワは運動が苦手で友達が少ない文系少年。そんなトキワの元へ集まったのは、主人公チックな男たちだった！忍者、源術師、そして人工知能との出会いによって、トキワの退屈な日常は劇的に変化していく！

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Itsudemo Jitaku Ni Kaereru Ore Wa, Isekai De Gyoushounin O Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: いつでも自宅に帰れる俺は、異世界で行商人をはじめました

altTitles.en: Peddler in Another World: I Can Go Back to My World Whenever I Want
I Can Always Go Home, so I Started as a Peddler in Another World

altTitles.ka: მე ყოველთვის შემიძლია სახლში წასვლა, ამიტომ დავიწყე როგორც გამყიდველი სხვა სამყაროში

description.en:
"Won't I be able to get filthy rich if I use this skill?"  
  
Continually exploited at work, Amata Shirou quits his job and moves to his grandma's house. When he finds out that it's connected to another world, he comes up with a plan to set up a business selling Japanese goods.   
  
The story of a man getting rich using his skill that converts the currency of the other world to Japanese yen and so forth.

altTitles.ja: ワイルドストロベリー

description.en: Plants have evolved. They can now feed on humans and become terrible monsters known as Jinka. Kingo and Kayano do their best to survive in a Tokyo overrun by plants, but when Kayano becomes a Jinka, Kingo will do anything he can to get her back!
description.ja: それは「人花」と呼ばれ、植物が人間を狩る側へと進化を遂げた。血の繋がりは無いが幼い頃から共に生きるキンゴとカヤノは植物に覆われた東京で“家族”に憧れて二人でひっそりと暮らす。そんな中カヤノは自らに寄生する人花を人花処理を任務とする“花葬隊”に見つかってしまい…。本当の家族になる為にも、カヤノを元の人間に戻すことを誓ったキンゴの戦いが始まる――!!

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

altTitles.ja: ＧＥ～グッドエンディング～

description.en:
Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is.

- Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)

altTitles.en: The Maid Who Can't Hide Her Feelings (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: メイカさんは押しころせない

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

altTitles.vi: Meika-san Không Thể Thổ Lộ Tình Cảm Của Cô Ấy

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

altTitles.ja: 極道パラサイツ

description.en: Mai Shintani, who works at the Kitakabane Police Station was suddenly assigned in the "Organized Crime Countermeasures Division", commonly known as the "Sotai". Immediately after that, she gained influence within her jurisdiction. The leader of expanding yakuza faction "Tatsygamigumi" Shogo Mikuro mysteriously disappeared. There's a tension in the conflict between cases of opposing Yakuza groups. And for some reason, Shintani is looking composed at the northern police station. Behind it is an absurd shocking truth?!

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点３／亜種並行世界 屍山血河舞台 下総国 英霊剣豪七番勝負

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten 3 / Ashu Heikou Sekai: Shizan Ketsuga Butai, Shimousa no Kuni - Eirei Kengou Nanaban Shoubu

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ -Эпопея Остатка- Турнир Семи Героев-Мастеров Меча

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng III – Vũ Đài Núi Thây Sông Máu – Trận Chiến Thứ Bảy Ở Shimosha

description.en:
Fans of Fate/Grand Order—rejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!

---

Note: The chapters in this title follow magazine release numbering.
description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

description.en: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

altTitles.ja: 男塾外伝 赤石剛次

description.en: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Akashi Gouji.

A short story featuring Robots and Big Monsters that takes place in the "Modern MoGal" Universe.  
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.

title.en: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei no Shoujo wo Kau

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl

altTitles.id: Thief Pemabuk yang Membeli Budak Gadis

altTitles.es-la: Un Ladrón Borracho que Compró una Esclava

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

title.en: Lies of the Sheriff Evans: Dead or Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoankan Evans no Uso - Dead or Love

altTitles.ja: 保安官エヴァンスの嘘
保安官エヴァンスの嘘 ～DEAD OR LOVE～

description.en: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.
description.ru: Шериф Элмор Эванс, слывущий на Диком Западе искусным стрелком, вечно терпит поражение в любви.

title.en: Vignette Witch! ~Joshi-ka no Mahou to Isekai Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: ヴィネット・ウィッチ！～女子化の魔法と異世界生活～

altTitles.en: Vignette Witch! - Isekai Life with Feminization Magic

description.en:
Recently, Hama Konpachi has been having nightmares about a ribbon growing out of his chest. That's not to mention all the strangers who mistake him for a girl, and the nickname "princess" that his classmates use. His childhood friend Shintarou says he worries too much about his femininity, but Konpachi just can't abandon his wish.  "I need to become a big, strong boy as soon as possible!"

But then one day, he's pulled into a strange book in the library and meets Marianne, the self proclaimed "strongest witch in history." She makes him an offer. "Will you become my pupil?" Magic is something that can only be used by "maidens," but somehow the male Konpachi has the potential?

But before Marianne can finish speaking, that ribbon from his dream begins growing and wraps Konpachi up! And when the ribbon comes undone, Konpachi has become... a girl?

Can Konpachi use his feminization magic to escape from the Vignette in this gender-bending fantasy story?
description.ja: 羽間コンパチは最近、胸にリボンが生えた夢を見る。それでなくても周りからは女の子に見られ、同級生からは「姫」なんて呼び名もつけられる乙女な見た目。幼なじみの慎太郎は気にしすぎだと言って取り合わない。コンパチは「一日も早くごっつい男子になりたい」という願いを持っている。そんなある日、図書館で見つけた不思議な本に引き込まれ、自称「史上最強の魔女」だというマリアンヌに出会う。彼女はコンパチに「弟子にならない？」と言ってきた。本来魔法の資質は「乙女」にしかないと言われているが、なぜか男のコンパチにはあるという。そんなマリアンヌの言葉も終わらないうちに、夢で見たリボンが胸から生えてコンパチを包む。そのリボンが解けると、そこには女体化したコンパチが…！

altTitles.ja: ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル

description.en: In order to achieve her goal Yumeko Makino starts the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way, in game and in real life.
description.ja: とある目的のため、ネットゲーム『ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル』（通称：ビビモン）を始めた夢子。ゲーム内で偶然助けてくれた女の子がとても内気なクラスメイトで…!?個性豊かなキャラクター達がゲームの内外で心を通じ合わせる『ビビモン』の世界へ、いざ！

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ja: 親子3人で幸せな家庭を築いていた流（ながれ）一家。だが、息子の桐崇は学校でひそかに虐めにあっていた。そして起きてしまったある事件をきっかけに、息子を想う母の愛が暴走していく――。
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: 陽下3姉妹はかまってほしい
陽下さんちの3姉妹

description.en:
A slightly erotic home love comedy that unfolds under the roof of the Yoshita family!  
  
The eldest daughter, Juri, wears a swimsuit at home. The second daughter, Minori, has big natural breasts. The third daughter, Anri, loves reptiles. An adolescent boy who is an idol otaku becomes a sibling with these three girls. Under the roof of the Yoshita family, another naughty incident occurs today! [Translated by DeepL]
